entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms early in the evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
